## Tolvaptan
-   Tolvptan: 30mg/60mgPBS, 1 pack, 5 repeats Code 888 
-   Monthly LFT for 1 months (set up 18 chart reviews)
-   LFT (AST,ALT,BILI) >2 ULN or 2X baseline hold and repeat
-   If >3x discontinue
-   UOSM < 280
